question:
Are the pools open? We re planning to travel from 11th to the 18th July.
 Thank you.
answer: Outdoor pool is open, indoor pool is closed until September. You can also use our new beach club (sunbeds and sun umbrellas are free for hotel guests)

question: Is the parking free?
answer: Parking free is 15 EUR per parking space per day in pariod April - December. In other periods parking fee is 13 EUR per day. VAT is included, fee can be paid at the parking machine or hotel reception. Parking (garage and outdoor) is under surveillance.
